posts.post_content:
Posted By: Keith O'Leary
Looking for a decent, graded example of any 1 of the 4. Feel free to let me know what you have available and needed $. I do have some trade bait if anyone is interested in any of it. thanks, Keith
[url]http://s45.photobucket.com/albums/f92/vwtdi55/For%20Sale/[/url]
 
Edited to add I will also offer a 1921 Herpolsheimer card (I have 3, Milton Stock, John "Bull" Henry, Jim Vaughn) as trade bait.

Posted By: Eric
Keith,

I have this one available for $800
I'm also willing to trade it for a beater Wagner card (e90-1, e91, e92, e93, e95) or for other PSA graded E91s and E102s
